content.rendered:
Focus on your idea and let us build a PoC

With our executive team members helping to launch and restart a number of companies in the last 10 years, we know the value of technology and what good Proof of Concept can do to change the opinion of the potential investors. That’s why we came up with a special offering for companies that want to quickly and relatively inexpensively test out new ideas.
Find out more

Base package

 6,000€
  • Three sessions with product owner working to maximize the value of the product by helping define and prioritize scope
  • Definition of the visual style and usability requirements with our UI/UX team (up to 20h) for web or mobile
  • Development of the architecture guidelines
  • Definition of the technical requirements
  • High-level implementation plan development
View an example

Extended package

 10,000€
  • Three sessions with product owner working to maximize the value of the product by helping define and prioritize scope
  • Definition of the visual style and usability requirements with our UI/UX team (up to 20h) for web or mobile
  • Development of the architecture guidelines
  • Definition of the technical requirements
  • High-level implementation plan development
  • Working prototype of web app (data entry and retrieval, basic logic)
  • UI/UX of mobile/web (complimenting Base choice)
  • Detailed requirements
  • Detailed plan or RFP/RFQ set to start procurement
View an example

Base package

 6,000€
  • Three sessions with product owner working to maximize the value of the product by helping define and prioritize scope
  • Definition of the visual style and usability requirements with our UI/UX team (up to 20h) for web or mobile
  • Development of the architecture guidelines
  • Definition of the technical requirements
  • High-level implementation plan development

  • Three sessions with product owner working to maximize the value of the product by helping define and prioritize scope
  • Definition of the visual style and usability requirements with our UI/UX team (up to 20h) for web or mobile
  • Development of the architecture guidelines
  • Definition of the technical requirements
  • High-level implementation plan development
  • Working prototype of web app (data entry and retrieval, basic logic)
  • UI/UX of mobile/web (complimenting Base choice)
  • Detailed requirements
  • Detailed plan or RFP/RFQ set to start procurement
